thread.title: Neiman Marcus is offering a high horsepower holiday
thread.title_full: Neiman Marcus is offering a high horsepower holiday | Examiner.com

author: Mary Conway
title: Neiman Marcus is offering a high horsepower holiday
text:
Neiman Marcus is out with its Christmas Book and one of its fantasy gifts for this holiday is a 700 horsepower Mustang . The Limited-Edition Neiman Marcus 2015 Mustang comes complete with its own color scheme and commemorative badging. The convertible also celebrates the Ford Mustang's 50th Anniversary.
Courtesy Neiman Marcus Christmas Book View all 6 photos Courtesy Neiman Marcus Neiman Marcus started taking orders for the special edition at noon EDT, October 13, 2015. Only 100 of the Limited-Editions will be available at $95,000. The gift package includes a 2-Day Ford Racing School Course. Neiman Marcus will also donate $1000 to The Heart of Neiman Marcus Foundation for each Mustang purchased.
The Mustang Club of America featured the special edition in its latest newsletter .
The Neiman Marcus Mustang is only available in a manual transmission. It features a 2.3 L TVS Supercharger system with upgraded fuel system and custom calibration. The 700 horsepower engine puts out over 600 ft-lbs of torque. Each vehicle will have a certificate of authenticity and its serial number on the dash. The vehicles will also have Neiman Marcus custom embroidered headrests and floor mats.
The 2015 Neiman Marcus Limited-Edition Mustangs should be delivered by March 1, 2016.
